creator: PTI
title: ‘Securitisation volumes down 7.2% in FY18 on GST ambiguity’
dc:creator: PTI
content: The traded volumes of PSLCs rose 3.7 times that of those witnessed in FY17, leading to a dip in in the securitisation volumes as the activity was largely concentrated on the non-PSL portfolios.
contentSnippet: The traded volumes of PSLCs rose 3.7 times that of those witnessed in FY17, leading to a dip in in the securitisation volumes as the activity was largely concentrated on the non-PSL portfolios.
